summary: This is a Florida Uniform Traffic Citation issued to Robert W. Parr on May 10, 2006, for unlawfully exceeding the speed limit in Palm Beach County. The document includes instructions for payment and compliance, and is part of the Epstein case data set, suggesting a potential connection to the investigation's financial or property records.

keyFacts: Robert W. Parr received a traffic citation in Palm Beach County on May 10, 2006, for a speeding violation.
The document is a standard Florida Uniform Traffic Citation form (FHPL-06-OFF-066887) with instructions for payment and compliance.
This document appears in the Epstein case data set, indicating it was collected as part of the investigation, though the direct connection to Epstein is not stated in the text.
